item.title: 25 Best Cheap Watches Under $1,000 (2025): Timex, Hamilton, and Seiko
item.description: Watches can be an expensive hobby. That’s why we’ve put together a list of our favorite wristwatches under $1,000—from Hamilton and Seiko to Timex and Farer.
